sentences.sContent: Farmers have been slow to make adequate provision for their retirement.
sentences.sCn: 农民们迟迟没有为退休做好适当安排。

sentences.sContent: Some creams we tested failed to give adequate protection against UV light.
sentences.sCn: 我们检测的有些防晒霜不能提供足够的防紫外线保护。

sentences.sContent: The standard of his work is barely adequate .
sentences.sCn: 他的工作水准勉强合格。

sentences.sContent: The company has yet to provide an adequate explanation for its actions.
sentences.sCn: 该公司对其行动仍未作出充分解释。

phrases.pCn: 胜任……的；对……是足够的；适合……的

remMethod.val: ad(表加强) ＋ equ(平等) ＋ ate(…的) → 比平等多的 → 足够的

trans.tranOther: enough in quantity or of a good enough quality for a particular purpose
